Name: CYNOROID GAIDEN
About the game: This is a mouse-aimable (free-aiming) side-scrolling action game. Four dungeons and 20 levels await you! Shoot, carve, and smash! //////// Story 'NO19827 A mechanical voice woke me up today. I wonder where I died last time. I can't remember. As usual, I am covered in gunpowder and blood. 'NO 19827, test commencing.' 'Please proceed to the test dungeon.' When am I going to get past this dungeon? No, I don't think I want to go through it. Always. I just want to keep fighting. May your 19827th life be a good one. Translated with www.DeepL.com/Translator (free version)
